ygData.subject: Re: A lead?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Uhm, I think those templates make those items you need to make those adorable cookies, or something.  It is a bakery thing. ... Ball of clay?  No idea, but
ygData.messageBody:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>Cut and paste of An EQ-Vault post
>
>
> While doing pottery in Kelethin, I got aware of the merchant selling
>pottery sketches also sold something called "Gnome templates", "Barbarian
> templates" and a couple more I think. What is this? Anyone?

Uhm, I think those templates make those items you need to make those
adorable cookies, or something. It is a bakery thing.


> In The Oasis of Marr I saw the gypsies were selling "A ball of clay".
>Is
>this for pottery? (It could be that my memory betrays me, and that those
> clayballs were sold in "The Emporium" in FP, not sure).
> Anyway, if you have the answer, or facts on any of these subjects,
>please
>reply here.

Ball of clay? No idea, but I would imagine its just more pottery stuff.
